Posts.EditableText:
Hello, my name is Etienne and I'm new to the community. 
I was wondering if anyone would be available to test my interactive fiction before it gets published. I'd like feedback on the prose, story, puzzles, the works!
I don't know if this is something people do at all. Worth a shot!
Thank you.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Game creators often place their games in work in progress section to get feedback,
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/tag/wip

But yes, it will often go unnoticed, but gladly, you made a smart choice to announce your work in progress game in forum as well which helps your game gets more attention.
